column1: The word 'ちゃう' is an informal or colloquial contraction of two auxiliary verbs 'てしまう' or 'でしまう', which indicate the completion of an action, often with a nuance of regret or inevitability. It may also convey a sense of something happening accidentally or without control.
宿題を忘れちゃった。 (I forgot my homework.)
